question: Write a letter to your friend about a job opportunity you came across that they might find interesting.
text: I am writing to inform you about a job opportunity I came across when I was browsing the website jobstreet.com and you might find it interesting.

Mercury Drug Corporation, Bayani Road Branch, is hiring for Pharmacist 1 Position and is offering a higher compensation compared to other major drug stores in your area. They also provide dental and medical benefits including three of your dependents which is a plus.

Upon reading the qualifications, I am sure you are highly qualified since you are a licensed Pharmacist with good moral character and a pleasing personality.  In addition, previous work experience is not necessary which is perfect for you since you are a fresh graduate and is newly licensed. I hope you will consider this job opportunity as it is located just a block away from your home and it will save you from transportation costs.
If you wish to apply, you may email your application letter to the branch supervisor, Miss Jecill Gomez, at her email address [email protected]
I hope to hear positive news about your ap[plication.
